help.short: Create Put ManagedNetworkGroups operation creates or updates a Managed Network Group resource
Delete Delete ManagedNetworkGroups operation deletes a Managed Network Group specified by the resource group, Managed Network name, and group name
List ListByManagedNetwork ManagedNetworkGroup operation retrieves all the Managed Network Groups in a specified Managed Networks in a paginated format.
Get Get ManagedNetworkGroups operation gets a Managed Network Group specified by the resource group, Managed Network name, and group name
Manage Managed Network Group
Create Put ManagedNetworkPeeringPolicies operation creates/updates a new Managed Network Peering Policy
Delete Delete ManagedNetworkPeeringPolicies operation deletes a Managed Network Peering Policy, specified by the  resource group, Managed Network name, and peering policy name
List ListByManagedNetwork PeeringPolicies operation retrieves all the Managed Network Peering Policies in a specified Managed Network, in a paginated format.
Get Get ManagedNetworkPeeringPolicies operation gets a Managed Network Peering Policy resource, specified by the  resource group, Managed Network name, and peering policy name
Manage Managed Network Peering Policy
Create Put ManagedNetworks operation creates/updates a Managed Network Resource, specified by resource group and Managed Network name
Delete Delete ManagedNetworks operation deletes a Managed Network Resource, specified by the  resource group and Managed Network name
List ListByResourceGroup ManagedNetwork operation retrieves all the Managed Network resources in a resource group in a paginated format.
Get Get ManagedNetworks operation gets a Managed Network Resource, specified by the resource group and Managed Network name
Update the specified Managed Network resource tags.
Manage Managed Network
Create a scope assignment.
Delete a scope assignment.
List the specified scope assignment.
Get the specified scope assignment.
Manage Scope Assignment
Manage Managed Network
